Package.Name: Arcade and Sniper
Package.InternalNotes:
crosshair_arcade.wotmod -> arcadeCrosshair.swf
crosshair_Controls.wotmod -> battleCrosshairsApp.swf, crosshairControls.swf
crosshair_sniper.wotmod -> crosshair_sniper.swf

Here's an url that has just penetration information (crosshair controls)
https://wotsite.net/pritsely/3107-krug-svedeniya-dlya-wot-s-probitiem.html
Package.Description: Crosshairs for arcade and sniper mode

Package.Name: 2DZoom
Package.InternalNotes: -use files from var1 folder and not var2 folder

Package.Name: Armored Warfare [by {author}]
Package.InternalNotes: -ignore the crew voice downloads on the download site\r\n-crew voice dls should be #2 and #3 links\r\n-xhair should be around 1.4MB
Package.Author: Johnda & Andre_V

Package.Name: V1
Package.InternalNotes: -should be "V.1" folder

Package.Name: V2
Package.InternalNotes: -should be "V.2" folder

Package.Name: Bushmaster [by {author}]
Package.InternalNotes: -use files from "ENG" folder
Package.Author: Valuhov & Andre_V
Package.Description: A crosshair for Arcade and Sniper mode with rapid information

Package.Name: Blue
Package.InternalNotes: -check folder "Byryuza"\r\n-for inner blue circle, check subfolder "Сведение с синим заполнением круга"->"Flattening with blue circle filling "

Package.Name: Harpoon
Package.InternalNotes:
crosshair_sniper.wotmod and crosshair_arcade.wotmod are the same for all varaiations, the changes are in crosshair_controls.wotmod

so the sniper and arcade is in this one as the base

EXCEPTION - "NewWhiteLight"

old dev url
http://forum.worldoftanks.ru/index.php?/topic/1419789-

Package.Name: Black Circle
Package.Description: for pictures look at White Circle

Package.Name: Black Square
Package.Description: for pictures look at White Circle

Package.Name: J1mBO´s Crosshair
Package.InternalNotes: crosshair arcade and sniper have no changes between the 3 versions (all versions are different crosshair controls)

Package.Name: Kellerman
Package.InternalNotes: Без разбитого стекла -> No broken glass\r\nС разбитым стеклом -> With broken glass

Package.Name: MeltyMap [by {author}]
Package.InternalNotes: Use the regular folders (not alternative)
Package.Author: Andre_V

Package.Name: Strike
Package.InternalNotes:
Biryuza - Blue
Green - Green

old dev url:
https://tanksmod.com/sight-strike-for-world-of-tanks/
Package.Description:
Introducing a completely new sight for people with poor eyesight, Strike sight is designed specifically for casual gamers. Bright green color contrasting looks on all maps of the game. 

Features:
-Shows the distance to the target
-Recharge time
-The strength of your tank
-Shows the thickness of enemy armor
-Animation recharge

Package.Name: Tank Blue Strike
Package.Description:
Introducing a completely new sight for people with poor eyesight, Strike sight is designed specifically for casual gamers. Bright green color contrasting looks on all maps of the game. 

Features:

-Recharge time
-The strength of your tank
-Shows the thickness of enemy armor
-Animation recharge

Package.Name: rotation

Package.Name: Gun Constraints for SPG and Artillery (Type set in garage)
Package.InternalNotes: 2019-08-08: using protankis gunconstraints from protanki modpack
Package.Description: Needed by all those who play tanks with limited horizontal guidance angles - self-propelled guns and tank destroyers. \r\nBy installing this mod indicators will be added on the sides of the sight in your combat interface, which will show you the boundaries to which you can rotate the barrel.
